attributes.additional_details:
I believe that change needs to be made regarding the Eurovision song contest.
In the 2013 final I counted 8 out of 26 singing in their native language.
I believe hearing and being involved in all the wonderful cultures in Europe is a good thing and was really looking forward to hearing loads of different cultures in one night.
The ones who did sing in their native language also received low scores which was very sad to see.
Unfortunately things have been like this for a very long time.
I would like the government to look into making Eurovision more cultural so that the majority if not all, are singing in their native language.
Bring culture back.
